languages.text: "Я ведь уже сказала, что не хочу подвергать навигаторов Дома еще большей опасности. Они и так могут рискнуть и отправиться следом, ведомые отголосками моего Атласа... Но я все же надеюсь, что мои подданные не столь безумны. Нет. Этот путь я пройду сама".

traits.locale_text: "Я ведь уже сказала, что не хочу подвергать Навигаторов Дома Орселлио еще большей опасности. Нет... Этот путь я пройду сама".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."
languages.original_text: "Я ведь уже сказала, что не хочу подвергать навигаторов Дома еще большей опасности. Они и так могут рискнуть и отправиться следом, ведомые отголосками моего Атласа... Но я все же надеюсь, что мои подданные не столь безумны. Нет. Этот путь я пройду сама".

traits.locale_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to subject the Orsellio Navigators to even greater danger. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet I hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must walk this path myself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「すでにお伝えしたとおり、オーセリオ家の航宙士をこれ以上危険にさらしたくはないのです。それでも、あたくしのアトラスの反響を導きに、大きな危険を侵して我々を追跡してくる可能性はありますが…臣下が無謀な行動にでないことを祈ります。そんなことがあってはなりませんい。ロード・キャプテン、あたくしはこの道を自力で進まねばならないのです」
languages.original_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."

traits.locale_text: 「すでにお伝えしたとおり、オーセリオ家の航宙士をこれ以上危険にさらしたくはないのです。それでも、あたくしのアトラスの反響を導きに、大きな危険を侵して我々を追跡してくる可能性はありますが…臣下が無謀な行動にでないことを祈ります。そんなことがあってはなりませんい。ロード・キャプテン、あたくしはこの道を自力で進まねばならないのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我早就告诉过你，我不希望再为奥赛罗家族的导航者带来任何危险。他们确实有可能会愿意冒着这么可怕的风险，聆听圣仪回声的指引，与我一同踏上这场冒险……但即便如此，我也希望我的臣民不要这么愚蠢。不行，舰长大人，我必须亲自踏上这场旅程。”
languages.original_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."

traits.locale_text: “我早就告诉过你，我不希望再为奥塞罗家族的导航者带来任何危险。他们确实有可能会愿意冒着这么可怕的风险，聆听圣仪回声的指引，与我一同踏上这场冒险……但即便如此，我也希望我的臣民不要这么愚蠢。不行，舰长大人，我必须亲自踏上这场旅程。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous ai déjà dit que je ne souhaitais pas mettre les navigateurs Orsellio encore plus en danger qu'ils ne le sont déjà. Nul doute que certains accepteraient de prendre un tel risque et de nous suivre en se laissant guider par les échos de mon Atlas... même si j'espère sincèrement que mes sujets ne sont pas aussi stupides. Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je dois y aller seule. »
languages.original_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai déjà dit que je ne souhaitais pas mettre les navigateurs Orsellio encore plus en danger qu'ils ne le sont déjà. Nul doute que certains accepteraient de prendre un tel risque et de nous suivre en se laissant guider par les échos de mon Atlas... même si j'espère sincèrement que mes sujets ne sont pas aussi stupides. Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je dois y aller seule. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Ya le he dicho que no deseo poner en peligro a los navegantes Orsellio. Cabe la posibilidad de que asuman este terrible riesgo y nos sigan de todos modos, guiándose por los ecos de mi Atlas... Y aun así, albergo la esperanza de que mis súbditos no sean tan insensatos. No, Lord Capitán, debo recorrer este camino yo sola».
languages.original_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."

traits.locale_text: «Ya le he dicho que no deseo poner en peligro a los navegantes Orsellio. Cabe la posibilidad de que asuman este terrible riesgo y nos sigan de todos modos, guiándose por los ecos de mi Atlas... Y aun así, albergo la esperanza de que mis súbditos no sean tan insensatos. No, Lord Capitán, debo recorrer este camino yo sola».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch bereits gesagt, dass ich die Orsellio-Navigatoren nicht noch weiter gefährden will. Vielleicht gehen sie dennoch dieses schreckliche Risiko ein und folgen uns, lauschen den Echos des Atlas, um meinen Rat zu hören ... Und doch hoffe ich, dass meine Untertanen nicht derart töricht sind. Nein, Lord Captain, ich muss diesen Pfad selbst beschreiten."
languages.original_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch bereits gesagt, dass ich die Orsellio-Navigatoren nicht noch weiter gefährden will. Vielleicht gehen sie dennoch dieses schreckliche Risiko ein und folgen uns, lauschen den Echos des Atlas, um meinen Rat zu hören ... Und doch hoffe ich, dass meine Untertanen nicht derart töricht sind. Nein, Lord Captain, ich muss diesen Pfad selbst beschreiten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Orsellio Rotacılarını daha fazla tehlikeye atmak istemediğimi sana söylemiştim. Her şeye rağmen bu riske girip bizi takip etmeleri, rehberlik etsin diye Atlasımın yankılarını dinleme olasılıkları var. Yine de kullarımın mantıksız davranmayacağını umuyorum. Hayır Lord Kaptan, bu yola kendi başıma çıkmalıyım."
languages.original_text: "I have already told you that I do not wish to imperil the Orsellio Navigators further. It is possible that they will still take on this terrible risk and follow us, listening to the echoes of my Atlas for guidance... And yet, I do hope that my subjects are not that senseless. No, Lord Captain, I must tread this path myself."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Rotacılarını daha fazla riske atmak istemediğimi sana söylemiştim. Her şeye rağmen bu riske girip bizi takip etmeleri, rehberlik etsin diye Atlasımın yankılarını dinlemeleri olasılığı var... Yine de umuyorum ki kullarım o kadar mantıksız hareket etmeyecektir. Hayır Lord Kaptan, bu yola kendim çıkmalıyım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
